// StoneDetail.js import React from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; //import './StoneDetail.css'; // Ensure this path is correct import './ModernStyle.css'; // Ensure this path is correct const stones = [ { id: 1, name: "Aquabella", image_url: "/images/Aquabella.jpeg", description: "A beautiful blue stone known for its vibrant color.", origin: "Brazil", type: "Granite", mine: "Rio de Janeiro Mine", additionalInfo: "Aquabella is popular for countertops and flooring."}, { id: 2, name: "Branco piracema", image_url: "/images/Branco_piracema.jpeg", description: "A white stone with gray streaks.", origin: "Brazil", type: "Granite", mine: "Sao Paulo Mine", additionalInfo: "Branco piracema is popular for countertops and flooring." }, { id: 3, name: "Branco superiore", image_url: "/images/Branco_superiore.jpeg" , description: "A white stone with black and gray streaks.", origin: "Brazil", type: "Granite", mine: "Sao Paulo Mine", additionalInfo: "Branco superiore is popular for countertops and flooring." }, { id: 4, name: "Cristalo", image_url: "/images/Cristalo.jpeg", description: "A white stone with black and gray streaks.", origin: "Brazil", type: "Granite", mine: "Sao Paulo Mine", additionalInfo: "Cristalo is popular for countertops and flooring." }, { id: 5, name: "Kouros quartzito", image_url: "/images/Kouros_quartzito.jpeg", description: "A white stone with black and gray streaks.", origin: "Brazil", type: "Granite", mine: "Sao Paulo Mine", additionalInfo: "Kouros quartzito is popular for countertops and flooring." }, { id: 6, name: "Matarazzo", image_url: "/images/Matarazzo.jpeg", description: "A white stone with black and gray streaks.", origin: "Brazil", type: "Granite", mine: "Sao Paulo Mine", additionalInfo: "Matarazzo is popular for countertops and flooring." }, { id: 7, name: "Negresco", image_url: "/images/Negresco.jpeg" , description: "A white stone with black and gray streaks.", origin: "Brazil", type: "Granite", mine: "Sao Paulo Mine", additionalInfo: "Negresco is popular for countertops and" }, { id: 8, name: "Tai perla", image_url: "/images/tai_perla.jpeg" , description: "A white stone with black and gray streaks.", origin: "Brazil", type: "Granite", mine: "Sao Paulo Mine", additionalInfo: "Tai perla is popular for countertops and flooring." }, { id: 9, name: "Verde Sao Francisco", image_url: "/images/Verde_Sao_Francisco.jpeg" , description: "A white stone with black and gray streaks.", origin: "Brazil", type: "Granite", mine: "Sao Paulo Mine", additionalInfo: "Verde Sao Francisco is popular for countertops and flooring." }, { id: 10, name: "Tia lactea", image_url: "/images/via_lactea.jpeg" , description: "A white stone with black and gray streaks.", origin: "Brazil", type: "Granite", mine: "Sao Paulo Mine", additionalInfo: "Tia lactea is popular for countertops and flooring." } ]; function StoneDetail() { const { id } = useParams(); const stone = stones.find(stone => stone.id === parseInt(id)); if (!stone) { return
Stone not found!
; } return (

{stone.name}

{stone.description}

); } export default StoneDetail;
